scripts.start: concurrently "cd host; npm run dev" "cd home; npm run dev" "cd sellers; npm run dev" "cd i18next-shared-lib; npm run dev"
scripts.e2e:ci: yarn start & wait-on http-get://localhost:3000/ && npx cypress run --config-file ../cypress/config/cypress.config.ts --config '{"supportFile": "../cypress/support/e2e.ts"}' --spec "./e2e/runAll*.cy.ts" --browser=chrome
